description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join Penkin in an amazing ball dodging adventure. Includes multiple gameplay modes, an original soundtrack, and jaw-dropping artwork. Players will enjoy countless hours of entertainment and excitement. Includes original Ball Dodge and special Defense mode.
